FestivalPlanner.TileMap

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.TileMap.Layer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObjectLayer, TileLayer

    public abstract class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents one Layer in TileMap.

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(org.jfree.fx.FXGraphics2D g2d)
        Draws the complete TileMap to the given graphics, always starts at point 0.0.

        This method is abstract, so this method needs to be overridden by subclasses.

        Parameters:
        g2d - object to draw on
